result.execSummary:
The defendant John Kevin Walton was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Court ordered defendant to pay all costs and surcharges and mandatory DNA surcharge by 06/01/15 if unpaid, a civil judgment will be ordered againt defendant. Court ordered defendant provide a DNA specimen.
Consecutive to: To any other sentence. time served.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. John Kevin Walton

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant John Kevin Walton in court with attorney Jamie Francis Cimpl-Wiemer.  Defendant John Kevin Walton in custody.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to the Criminal Complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the Information/Complaint. Judgment of conviction entered.  Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  The Court ordered the Defendant to serve 50 days  in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence with credit for (50) days - Time served.  
Court ordered defendant pay all costs and surcharges by
If unpaid, a civil judgment will be ordered filed against the defendant.
Court ordered defendant provide a DNA specimen and pay mandatory DNA Surcharge by 6-1-2015.  If unpaid, a civil judgment will be ordered filed against the defendant.
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.  Deputy Court Clerk jks
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Walgreen's located at 3522 W. Wisconsin Ave.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.   Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings. Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant John Kevin Walton in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Defendant John Kevin Walton in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  HMP
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Reserve Branch 46.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. Status conference scheduled for April 1, 2015 at 08:30am.

ADDRESS INFO for John Kevin Walton
Current: 2561 N 34th St., Milwaukee, WI 53210   (Effective: 02-11-2015)
Prior: 1820 West Wells Street, Milwaukee, WI 53233
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
